IMDb data; ttnr: 6473344, Title: SEAL Team, --- Description: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite","dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Burden of Truth

programme.desc: Burden of Truth: Created by Brad Simpson. With Kristin Kreuk, Peter Mooney, Meegwun Fairbrother, Anwen O'Driscoll. Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6987476/","name":"Burden of Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNiNTEyZmYtODIzMy00NmEzLTk4MmYtYTg4ZTc0MzJiOTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYzNDE4ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6987476/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"clarkj-565-161336"},"dateCreated":"2018-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Timely & Thought Provoking","reviewBody":"I don't watch a lot of television, but I was hooked on this show from the beginning. First of all it is Canadian, and it deals with many issues that face us all on a day to day basis. The central theme of our environment being poisoned is very important. Every day some new toxin enters our water supply. Our governments seem powerless to deal with these issues, although they are starting. The series has aspects that appeal to both young people and the older generation. The Millwood teens look forward to university careers in the big city, but tragedy intervenes. They each deal with their issues differently. Being a small town, we see all sorts of social interactions and problems brought out into the light of day. I thought the acting was really sincere and the writing excellent. The final episode is very cathartic, Joanna's dad is a type of lawyer that gives the profession a bad name, and that's putting it mildly.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3644,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-10","keywords":"legal drama,attorney,court case,legal system,female protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0471036/","name":"Kristin Kreuk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312105/","name":"Peter Mooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2868495/","name":"Meegwun Fairbrother"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121071/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466443/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800920/","name":"Brad Simpson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""Off the Field" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1975630617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"When it's suspected that her big-pharma client's vaccine has caused a mysterious illness affecting a handful of teenaged girls, high-powered attorney Joanna Hanley (Kristin Kreuk) returns to her hometown of Millwood to quickly and quietly settle the case."}}</script><metacontent="

The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Svaki član NCIS-a mora preuzeti odgovornost za posljedice svojih postupaka, počevši od Pridea. Loretta se uključuje u predizbornu kampanju. Kriminalistička serija pod nazivom Navy CSI New Orleans prikazuje tim specijalnih agenata koji istražuju slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje New Orleansa. Vođa tima agenata jest pravedni i hrabri Dwayne koji strastveno riješava svaki zadatak koji mu je dodijeljen.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Kad ekipa Navy CIS-a istražuje kobni pad marinske narednice sa zgrade, njezina Grace Confalone povjerava se Gibbsu i predlaže mu da istragu vodi kao da je riječ o slučaju ubojstva. Uz to, Torres traži... Kad ekipa Navy CIS-a istražuje kobni pad marinske narednice sa zgrade, njezina Grace Confalone povjerava se Gibbsu i predlaže mu da istragu vodi kao da je riječ o slučaju ubojstva. Uz to, Torres traži novi životni prostor.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Tijekom krstarenja s civilima, kada je rodbini posade dopušteno prenoćiti na brodu, na razaraču pronađeno je tijelo mornaričkog poručnika. Gibbs, Quinn i Palmer odlaze na pučinu istražiti taj slučaj.... Tijekom krstarenja s civilima, kada je rodbini posade dopušteno prenoćiti na brodu, na razaraču pronađeno je tijelo mornaričkog poručnika. Gibbs, Quinn i Palmer odlaze na pučinu istražiti taj slučaj. Uz to, McGee razmišlja o tome kako na savršen način zaprositi Delilu Fielding u Navy CIS-u.

programme.title: Papurika
Paprika
programme.desc:
Papurika: Directed by Satoshi Kon. With Megumi Hayashibara, Tôru Furuya, Kôichi Yamadera, Katsunosuke Hori. When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0851578/","name":"Papurika","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDliMTMxOWEtODM3Yi00N2QwLTg4YTAtNTE5YzBlNTA2NjhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0851578/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"awagner71692"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Stunning, Beautiful Feast For The Eyes","reviewBody":"I have only seen this movie a few hours ago and am still stunned by simply how incredible it was. Who ever thought anime could be so fantastical? While the plot, at times confusing and going on the border of being a stereotypical anime, is terrific and i couldn't ask for it to be any better. Many reviewers condemned this film because of the randomness and lack of explanation for some parts, but i believe that Satoshi Kon did this on purpose. Kon simply made this movie like a dream; it is colorful, incredible, random, and offers scarce explanations. The film wants you to think about what the meaning of these "dreams" are, instead of telling you what the meaning is, much like what you would have to do with a real dream. 

The best part of this film is that it can appeal to the non-anime fanatic crowd. I have seen all a few animes (only hayao miazaki films) so i wouldn't be called a true fan, and am not much into the science-fiction animes and what not that many people seem to love, yet i could not help but fall in love with Paprika. 

Please, Please, PLEASE see this movie. Its too incredible to go under-appreciated by the world. Perhaps the best film of 2007, maybe one of the best from the past few years, if you see this movie you will NOT regret it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76540,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Animation","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2006-11-25","keywords":"lucid dream,virtual reality,dream,police,butterfly collection","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paprika","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3734962457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3ZWM4ZjAtNzhlZS00NzVlLThjOTctZDA4MzBjMWJiMmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3ZWM4ZjAtNzhlZS00NzVlLThjOTctZDA4MzBjMWJiMmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures Classics"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370677/","name":"Megumi Hayashibara"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0256609/","name":"Tôru Emori"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394653/","name":"Katsunosuke Hori"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464804/","name":"Satoshi Kon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022946/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052145/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0875489/","name":"Yasutaka Tsutsui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2008007/","name":"Seishi Minakami"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464804/","name":"Satoshi Kon"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0851578/","name":"Papurika","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDliMTMxOWEtODM3Yi00N2QwLTg4YTAtNTE5YzBlNTA2NjhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0851578/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"awagner71692","dateCreated":"2007-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Stunning, Beautiful Feast For The Eyes","reviewBody":"I have only seen this movie a few hours ago and am still stunned by simply how incredible it was. Who ever thought anime could be so fantastical? While the plot, at times confusing and going on the border of being a stereotypical anime, is terrific and i couldn't ask for it to be any better. Many reviewers condemned this film because of the randomness and lack of explanation for some parts, but i believe that Satoshi Kon did this on purpose. Kon simply made this movie like a dream; it is colorful, incredible, random, and offers scarce explanations. The film wants you to think about what the meaning of these "dreams" are, instead of telling you what the meaning is, much like what you would have to do with a real dream. 

The best part of this film is that it can appeal to the non-anime fanatic crowd. I have seen all a few animes (only hayao miazaki films) so i wouldn't be called a true fan, and am not much into the science-fiction animes and what not that many people seem to love, yet i could not help but fall in love with Paprika. 

Please, Please, PLEASE see this movie. Its too incredible to go under-appreciated by the world. Perhaps the best film of 2007, maybe one of the best from the past few years, if you see this movie you will NOT regret it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76540,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Animation","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2006-11-25","keywords":"lucid dream,virtual reality,dream,police,butterfly collection","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paprika","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3734962457","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3ZWM4ZjAtNzhlZS00NzVlLThjOTctZDA4MzBjMWJiMmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzI3ZWM4ZjAtNzhlZS00NzVlLThjOTctZDA4MzBjMWJiMmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures Classics","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370677/","name":"Megumi Hayashibara","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0256609/","name":"Tôru Emori","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394653/","name":"Katsunosuke Hori"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464804/","name":"Satoshi Kon"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022946/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052145/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0875489/","name":"Yasutaka Tsutsui","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2008007/","name":"Seishi Minakami","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464804/","name":"Satoshi Kon"],"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" prati život tridesetogodišnje Ole Serafin koja napušta grad u kojem živi u supruga kako bi se vratila u rodni grad gdje je svjedočila sumnjivom događaju... Kriminalistička, televizijska serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" donosi priču o tridesetogodišnjoj ženi Oli Serafin koja se iz Londona treba vratiti u svoj rodni grad Łódź. Jedne večeri, svjedoči jednom sumnjivom događaju koji izgleda kao pokušaj samoubojstva. Pokušava pronaći pomoć preko interneta prilikom čega nailazi na skupinu detektiva amatera koji se bave slučajevima koje policija ne rješava.

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nolan pokušava pomoći prethodnom vlasniku svoje kuće da se opet poveže sa svojom obitelji, no situacija se mijenja kada neki muškarac provali u kuću usred noći. U međuvremenu, časnica Harper napokon... Nolan pokušava pomoći prethodnom vlasniku svoje kuće da se opet poveže sa svojom obitelji, no situacija se mijenja kada neki muškarac provali u kuću usred noći. U međuvremenu, časnica Harper napokon se može družiti sa svojom kćerkom, a Nolan mora raditi u tajnosti kako bi spasio Harperin život. Bradford i Chen istražuju ubojstvo kada je pronađen izgubljeni pas prekriven krvlju. Wesley postaje dječji odvjetnik, ali se bori s PTSP-om nakon što ga je dječak izbo nožem. Lopez i West pomažu zvijezdama policijske drame pokazujući im pravilnu policijsku proceduru.

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Odjel pomaže osuđenoj serijskoj ubojici Rosalind Dyer u pronalaženju posmrtnih ostataka njezinih žrtava kako bi joj smrtna kazna bila promijenjena u doživotni zatvor. Na putu do grobnica, tim mora... Odjel pomaže osuđenoj serijskoj ubojici Rosalind Dyer u pronalaženju posmrtnih ostataka njezinih žrtava kako bi joj smrtna kazna bila promijenjena u doživotni zatvor. Na putu do grobnica, tim mora zaustaviti muškarca da je ubije. Tamo otkrivaju nova tijela za koja se nije znalo da postoje. Izgleda da postoji još jedan serijski ubojica, no Dyer im odbija pomoći.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Mekia Cox, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Melissa O'Neil, Eric Winter, Harold Perrineau

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nolan vodi zaručnicu svog sina na vožnju s Bradfordom nakon što je ona otkrila da želi postati policajka. Bradford govori da će joj pomoći na policijskoj akademiji, ali kasnije otkriva Nolanu da ona... Nolan vodi zaručnicu svog sina na vožnju s Bradfordom nakon što je ona otkrila da želi postati policajka. Bradford govori da će joj pomoći na policijskoj akademiji, ali kasnije otkriva Nolanu da ona neće moći postati policijska časnica zbog kriminalnog dosjea. Harper traži od Bradforda da rotira novake na tjednoj bazi pa će se tako Chen pridružiti Bradfordu. Nakon drogiranja i groznog iskustva sa serijskim ubojicom, Chen se trudi vjerovati svojim prosudbama. No uskoro ona burno reagira kad jedan muškarac pokuša izvući ispali konac na njezinoj jakni.

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Chen se budi s tetovažom nakon što je bila drogirana na spoju. Policajci je traže nakon što je nisu vidjeli trinaest sati. Otkriveno je da je Caleb Wright, s kojim je bila na spoju, zapravo štićenik... Chen se budi s tetovažom nakon što je bila drogirana na spoju. Policajci je traže nakon što je nisu vidjeli trinaest sati. Otkriveno je da je Caleb Wright, s kojim je bila na spoju, zapravo štićenik serijske ubojice Rosalind Dyer. Dok svi traže Chen, Caleb otima Armstronga i odvodi ga u kuću koja je pripadala Rosalindinom ujaku. U međuvremenu, Angela i Wesley raspravljaju o Wesleyevom mentalnom zdravlju nakon što je on popio tablete s alkoholom. Rosalind otkriva Nolanu da ima još jednu tajnu, a ona je vezana za Armstronga.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Mekia Cox, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Melissa O'Neil, Eric Winter, Zayne Emory

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nolan dozna da mu je otac nedavno umro. Odvjetnik mu šalje nasljedstvo, koje uključuje i stari automobil. Novaci i njihovi časnici za obuku prolaze kroz "follow-up" dan, kada im se dodjeljuju... Nolan dozna da mu je otac nedavno umro. Odvjetnik mu šalje nasljedstvo, koje uključuje i stari automobil. Novaci i njihovi časnici za obuku prolaze kroz "follow-up" dan, kada im se dodjeljuju neaktivni slučajevi. Nolan i Harper istražuju pljačku lutrijskih listića i smrt supruge vlasnika trgovine. Trag ih vodi do striptiz-kluba, gdje plesačica sa šipke, Chastity, na snimkama videonadzora prepoznaje osumnjičenika kojeg traže, Tuckera Novaka. Novak ih zatim upućuje na Colta Henryja.

programme.title: Jobs
Jobs
programme.desc:
Jobs: Directed by Joshua Michael Stern. With Ashton Kutcher, Dermot Mulroney, Josh Gad, Lukas Haas. The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2357129/","name":"Jobs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5NTQ3MTYxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODE2Nzk3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2357129/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maneckk-414-209658"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"The name is JOBS steve jobs","reviewBody":"It is somewhat ironical that the man who always signed his name in the lower case 'steven p. jobs' has the movie in his name titled in capital JOBS. For me this was the most awaited movie of the year, more so because of having read the biography a couple of times. The ironies however does not end with the case of the font but the perfectionist he was, I am sure if among us today he would have wanted some (major) iterations in the movie before his actual story came out to the public. A movie reaches out to a much wider audience exponentially than a book and those of you who have read the book should agree with me that movie did not do complete justice to Jobs biopic.

Joshua Michael Stern who is known for directing dramas, has concentrated more on the dramatic side of Jobs rather than the genius his was. He has failed to explain the reason behind his outbursts, his mad passion for perfection, and the primary reason for the personality that was the Steve Jobs. I would not dwell into the particular events but Stern could have shown the cause and consequence for the milestones he achieved. Whether it was shortage of time or bad script writing the movie would fail to connect with audience who do not much about Jobs. Moreover, important events which made Jobs what he is like the creation of NeXT, the buying of Pixar and his fight with cancer are completely missing.

Ashton Kutcher has come a long way from portraying the stupid kid in That 70's show to portraying one of the geniuses of our generation. He is eerily similar to the original Steve Jobs and full marks to him for taking on the nuances, the body language and the talking style of the Apple founder. The jaw line was perfect and as a young Jobs he was flawless. The script could have given him more to showcase his acting prowess but sadly the whole movie cracked around there. I am sure Jobs family would also share the view of Kutcher doing a brilliant "JOB".

The only other character worth mentioning is that of Mike Marrkula played by Dermot Mulroney a brilliant actor with an equally brilliant performance. Matthew Modine, James Woods, John Getz and others are just supporting the main man as the in his real life it was all about himself. The music is good and you get to hear some famous Bob Dylan songs in the movie, as Steve was a big Dylan fan all this life.

Even though for me Steve Jobs life has been a 5/5, I had expected a much better product from the production and so would have Jobs. A 3/5 from me sadly for the movie and for all the Jobs and Apple fans this is a must watch. However I would suggest you read the book before going to the movie. Alternatively, if you have seen the movie and not the read the book, now is the time to pick it up and do it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95874,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-08-16","keywords":"male objectification,barefoot male,bare feet on table,feet on table,reference to steve jobs","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""American Legend"","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2922490137","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEyMTg2MzEzNTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDIyODMwMDAx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEyMTg2MzEzNTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDIyODMwMDAx._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000551/","name":"Dermot Mulroney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1265802/","name":"Josh Gad"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0827750/","name":"Joshua Michael Stern"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0342335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0377338/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131826/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4999782/","name":"Matt Whiteley"}],"duration":"PT2H8M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2357129, Title: Jobs, --- Description: Jobs: Directed by Joshua Michael Stern. With Ashton Kutcher, Dermot Mulroney, Josh Gad, Lukas Haas. The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2357129/","name":"Jobs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5NTQ3MTYxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODE2Nzk3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2357129/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"maneckk-414-209658","dateCreated":"2013-08-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"The name is JOBS steve jobs","reviewBody":"It is somewhat ironical that the man who always signed his name in the lower case 'steven p. jobs' has the movie in his name titled in capital JOBS. For me this was the most awaited movie of the year, more so because of having read the biography a couple of times. The ironies however does not end with the case of the font but the perfectionist he was, I am sure if among us today he would have wanted some (major) iterations in the movie before his actual story came out to the public. A movie reaches out to a much wider audience exponentially than a book and those of you who have read the book should agree with me that movie did not do complete justice to Jobs biopic.

Joshua Michael Stern who is known for directing dramas, has concentrated more on the dramatic side of Jobs rather than the genius his was. He has failed to explain the reason behind his outbursts, his mad passion for perfection, and the primary reason for the personality that was the Steve Jobs. I would not dwell into the particular events but Stern could have shown the cause and consequence for the milestones he achieved. Whether it was shortage of time or bad script writing the movie would fail to connect with audience who do not much about Jobs. Moreover, important events which made Jobs what he is like the creation of NeXT, the buying of Pixar and his fight with cancer are completely missing.

Ashton Kutcher has come a long way from portraying the stupid kid in That 70's show to portraying one of the geniuses of our generation. He is eerily similar to the original Steve Jobs and full marks to him for taking on the nuances, the body language and the talking style of the Apple founder. The jaw line was perfect and as a young Jobs he was flawless. The script could have given him more to showcase his acting prowess but sadly the whole movie cracked around there. I am sure Jobs family would also share the view of Kutcher doing a brilliant "JOB".

The only other character worth mentioning is that of Mike Marrkula played by Dermot Mulroney a brilliant actor with an equally brilliant performance. Matthew Modine, James Woods, John Getz and others are just supporting the main man as the in his real life it was all about himself. The music is good and you get to hear some famous Bob Dylan songs in the movie, as Steve was a big Dylan fan all this life.

Even though for me Steve Jobs life has been a 5/5, I had expected a much better product from the production and so would have Jobs. A 3/5 from me sadly for the movie and for all the Jobs and Apple fans this is a must watch. However I would suggest you read the book before going to the movie. Alternatively, if you have seen the movie and not the read the book, now is the time to pick it up and do it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95874,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-08-16","keywords":"male objectification,barefoot male,bare feet on table,feet on table,reference to steve jobs","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":""American Legend"","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2922490137","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEyMTg2MzEzNTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDIyODMwMDAx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEyMTg2MzEzNTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDIyODMwMDAx._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000551/","name":"Dermot Mulroney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1265802/","name":"Josh Gad"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0827750/","name":"Joshua Michael Stern"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0342335/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0377338/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131826/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4999782/","name":"Matt Whiteley"],"duration":"PT2H8M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Single Man
Samac
programme.desc: A Single Man: Directed by Tom Ford. With Colin Firth, Julianne Moore, Nicholas Hoult, Matthew Goode. An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1315981/","name":"A Single Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU5MTk4MjQ2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDU0MzEwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An English professor, one year after the sudden death of his boyfriend, is unable to cope with his typical days in 1960s Los Angeles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1315981/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"andrewors"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Colin's George and Adrian","reviewBody":"I've seen "A Single Man" twice already at different screenings and I believe I will see it again and again. Yes, for me is one of those films. Thank you Tom Ford and thank you Colin Firth. I love Colin and my favorite performance of his dates back to 1989 "Apartment Zero". George Falconer, Colin's character in "A Single Man" seems to me the flip side of Adrian Leduc, Colin's character in "Apartment Zero". George has had a real life and grieves the death of his companion. Adrian Leduc never had a companion and his grief is based on his total inability to connect with people. George believes that human connection is at the center of everything and puts that thought into practice. Adrian worships James Dean, George doesn't think that much of James Dean, he actually says it. Adrian wears white shirts made of cheap material and he launders them himself. George wears impeccably cut white shirts that he has professionally laundered. They seem tiny details but they become overwhelming when you know both characters. George even hurts himself and wears a band aid just like Adrian during the last 15 minutes of "Apartment Zero" I love Colin Firth because he's an actor that can give you so much doing, seemingly, so little. It compel us to participate and include our own thoughts and feelings. The love of George for his lover is as pungent and real as anything I've ever seen on the screen. It is a cinematic triumph and as I'm writing about it I feel a sort of urge to see it again, just as it happened to me when I saw "Apartment Zero" for the first time. I felt then that Colin deserved an Oscar nomination for Adrian, he will get it for George. This is the first comment I ever wrote and it comes out of a profound need to share this emotion. When movies can do that, film lovers all over the world have real reason to celebrate and I'm celebrating.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":109186,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-02-05","keywords":"practicing a suicide,car accident,broken heart,gay kiss,male full back nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Single Man's UK Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3409642521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5MDY1MTc1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxNjIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5MDY1MTc1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxNjIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Footage from A Single Man's UK Premiere"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000194/","name":"Julianne Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0328828/","name":"Matthew Goode"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053530/","name":"Tom Ford"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251339/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113177/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193161/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410877/","name":"Christopher Isherwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053530/","name":"Tom Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3179694/","name":"David Scearce"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Eliza Graves
Umobolnica na osami
programme.desc:
Eliza Graves: Directed by Brad Anderson. With Kate Beckinsale, Jim Sturgess, David Thewlis, Brendan Gleeson. An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane, and that there is more going on than meets the eye." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1772264/","name":"Eliza Graves","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg5NjU0MTM4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU1NDQzMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane, and that there is more going on than meets the eye.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1772264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"steve-2795"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"More hammer than Hammer","reviewBody":"I'd forgotten how much pop scares got on my tits until I watched Stonehearst Asylum. Because it doesn't have a single one. And it's a fine film.

I think it's somewhat miss-sold as a horror, though it's hard to know how else it should have been marketed. There's plenty of jeopardy but scarcely any gore. I guess its most accurately described as a Gothic romance.

It's a loose riff off Poe's "The System of Doctor Tarr and Professor Fether" with a few canny twists.

The cast is stellar: Ben Kingsley, Michael Caine, Kate Beckinsale, Sinead Cusak.

I tend to define films in terms of whether or not I would enjoy watching them with my undoubtedly better half. in this case, yes. It's a cracking film with a rattling storyline, The odd proto- feminist moment and no horror cheap shots. What's not to like?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54125,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-10-24","keywords":"madhouse,mental institution,gothic horror,psychotronic film,man wears a top hat","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stonehearst Asylum","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3960843289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTFkNWI2YzctMGEyZi00NWM4LTlkYTYtOWRmYzljNWJmZDJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTFkNWI2YzctMGEyZi00NWM4LTlkYTYtOWRmYzljNWJmZDJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Stonehearst Asylum"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000295/","name":"Kate Beckinsale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836343/","name":"Jim Sturgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000667/","name":"David Thewlis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0026442/","name":"Brad Anderson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073417/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086773/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000590/","name":"Edgar Allan Poe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2081303/","name":"Joe Gangemi"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1772264, Title: Eliza Graves, --- Description: Eliza Graves: Directed by Brad Anderson. With Kate Beckinsale, Jim Sturgess, David Thewlis, Brendan Gleeson. An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane, and that there is more going on than meets the eye." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1772264/","name":"Eliza Graves","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg5NjU0MTM4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU1NDQzMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Oxford graduate takes up a job in a mental asylum, only to discover that the "revolutionary" new treatments are inhumane, and that there is more going on than meets the eye.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1772264/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"steve-2795","dateCreated":"2015-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"More hammer than Hammer","reviewBody":"I'd forgotten how much pop scares got on my tits until I watched Stonehearst Asylum. Because it doesn't have a single one. And it's a fine film.

I think it's somewhat miss-sold as a horror, though it's hard to know how else it should have been marketed. There's plenty of jeopardy but scarcely any gore. I guess its most accurately described as a Gothic romance.

It's a loose riff off Poe's "The System of Doctor Tarr and Professor Fether" with a few canny twists.

The cast is stellar: Ben Kingsley, Michael Caine, Kate Beckinsale, Sinead Cusak.

I tend to define films in terms of whether or not I would enjoy watching them with my undoubtedly better half. in this case, yes. It's a cracking film with a rattling storyline, The odd proto- feminist moment and no horror cheap shots. programme.title: The November Man
November Man
programme.desc:
The November Man: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Pierce Brosnan, Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko, Bill Smitrovich. An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2402157/","name":"The November Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkzMDk5NjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMwOTMyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2402157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"abouhelier-r"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"The November Man","reviewBody":"An ex-CIA operative is brought in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect. 

The November Man is directed by Roger Donaldson and stars Pierce Brosnan as its title character. Roger Donaldson also directed The Bank Job (2008) which is one of Jason Statham' best movie. Let me tell you how excited I was when I heard that Pierce Brosnan was returning as a spy; A little bit nostalgic. This film is full of classic spy cliché such as, for instance, people walking away slow motion explosions and it doesn't seem to get started until half way through. However towards the third act the movie really showed itself and I was like: "Why didn't they do that from the beginning?" Unfortunately, the fact is that it's so terribly cliché since the beginning that when you see where things are going and certain puzzle pieces start to make sense, you are already checked out of the movie. Yet, Pierce Brosnan is great; he could play this role eyes closed. Olga Kurylenko is good as well, you grow some sympathy for her character and the movie takes on a completely different meaning when you realised certain things about her. Plus, I have to point out that women are over objectify and her character is only introduced when it's convenient for the man to have a bargaining girl which isn't as cool as it sounds. Brosnan's protegee starring Luke Bracey is pretty cool as well and I think this guy's got a future. This movie reminds me of two other movies released this years: 3 Days to Kill and Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit. 

Overall I think The November Man could have been a lot better thanks to a stronger writing and directing; it's good to see Pierce Brosnan back into the spy game.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65687,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-08-27","keywords":"stripper,premarital sex,sex standing up,sex scene,belgrade serbia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3721243673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.

programme.title: Rush
Rush
programme.desc:
Rush: Directed by Ron Howard. With Chris Hemsworth, Daniel Brühl, Olivia Wilde, Alexandra Maria Lara. The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1979320/","name":"Rush","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEwODJmZDItYTNmZC00OGM4LThlNDktOTQzZjIzMGQxODA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1979320/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bm2759"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"F1 finally has an amazing film","reviewBody":"This is an amazing film. I can't recommend it highly enough for F1 fans like me, sports fans, or anyone interested in a story of rivalry i.e. something different to the unoriginal junk movies which get churned out each year.

All the crew involved should pat themselves on the back. They've done a fabulous job making this film critique, explore and honour two memorable F1 drivers.

James Hunt's fun, party lifestyle along with his brash and raw driving talent. This is contrasted against Niki Lauda's methodical thinking, technical brilliance and professional lifestyle. These two characters are total opposites but as their lives are explored it also acknowledges the value of an enemy, i.e. something to beat. I believe this is a commentary on human nature in that the best of us shines when we have something to beat or overcome.

Do yourself a favour and see it now.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":452017,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-09-13","keywords":"formula 1,rivalry,1970s,racecar driver,playboy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1998301465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzA0MzkyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQxNjAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzA0MzkyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQxNjAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"From Ron Howard comes an exhilarating true story of two legendary rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda, starring Chris Hemsworth."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0117709/","name":"Daniel Brühl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1165110/","name":"Chris Hemsworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312575/","name":"Olivia Wilde"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234935/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285648/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604948/","name":"Peter Morgan"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Looking for Eric
Tražeći Erica
programme.desc:
Looking for Eric: Directed by Ken Loach. With Steve Evets, Eric Cantona, Stephanie Bishop, Gerard Kearns. Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending into crisis, receives some life coaching from the famously philosophical Eric Cantona." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1242545/","name":"Looking for Eric","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk1Mjk1NDk4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDg1MDczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending into crisis, receives some life coaching from the famously philosophical Eric Cantona.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1242545/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markgorman"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"heart warming","reviewBody":"Don't believe a word of the hype. Looking for Eric is not a Ken Loach comedy. It is, in several places, a very funny film indeed. But it is not a comedy. At a far fetched push you might call it a rom-com or a social satire. Me? I just think it's another brilliant Loachian movie. (Can you believe he's been at it for 45, yes 45, years since he wrote three episodes for z cars)? It's so sad, so desperate in places and then, yes, so funny.

And then there's Eric (Cantona). Ooh ah! And his goals. Ooh la la! And his cod (sorry sardine) philosophising. Oops ah! The Cantona character is inspired, as it is so self-deprecating- not a quality one associates with the French.

I loved this film but why is it so good? I think it's the way Loach makes his characters so utterly believable and, particularly in this movie, sympathetic. And as I always, always say it's because of the writing which is nailed on by long time collaborator Paul Laverty).

One of the back stories, about the elder stepson of Eric the postman (our hero played to perfection by Steve Evets in, I think, his first Loach movie) is really the backbone of the film. The eldest stepson (Gerard Kearns of Shameless fame) gets embroiled in some nasty business with a local gangland thug and threatens to destabilise Eric's whole fragile existence. But what doesn't kill you makes you stronger and that is certainly proved here.

It's a gem. A true Brit movie classic with a wee bit of the Auld Alliance thrown in.

J'adore Eric Cantona!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16682,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2009-05-27","keywords":"manchester,hoarding,mail hoarding,trust,social alienation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Looking for Eric: U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3450275609","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYzNzI2NTUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU0Nzg4MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYzNzI2NTUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU0Nzg4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending in to crisis, receives some life coaching from Eric Cantona, the famously philosophical footballer."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263740/","name":"Steve Evets"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0134642/","name":"Eric Cantona"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2288625/","name":"Stephanie Bishop"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516360/","name":"Ken Loach"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239471/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104621/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049689/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491956/","name":"Paul Laverty"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1242545, Title: Looking for Eric, --- Description: Looking for Eric: Directed by Ken Loach. With Steve Evets, Eric Cantona, Stephanie Bishop, Gerard Kearns. Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending into crisis, receives some life coaching from the famously philosophical Eric Cantona." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1242545/","name":"Looking for Eric","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk1Mjk1NDk4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDg1MDczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending into crisis, receives some life coaching from the famously philosophical Eric Cantona.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1242545/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"markgorman","dateCreated":"2009-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"heart warming","reviewBody":"Don't believe a word of the hype. Looking for Eric is not a Ken Loach comedy. It is, in several places, a very funny film indeed. But it is not a comedy. At a far fetched push you might call it a rom-com or a social satire. Me? I just think it's another brilliant Loachian movie. (Can you believe he's been at it for 45, yes 45, years since he wrote three episodes for z cars)? It's so sad, so desperate in places and then, yes, so funny.

And then there's Eric (Cantona). Ooh ah! And his goals. Ooh la la! And his cod (sorry sardine) philosophising. Oops ah! The Cantona character is inspired, as it is so self-deprecating- not a quality one associates with the French.

I loved this film but why is it so good? I think it's the way Loach makes his characters so utterly believable and, particularly in this movie, sympathetic. And as I always, always say it's because of the writing which is nailed on by long time collaborator Paul Laverty).

One of the back stories, about the elder stepson of Eric the postman (our hero played to perfection by Steve Evets in, I think, his first Loach movie) is really the backbone of the film. The eldest stepson (Gerard Kearns of Shameless fame) gets embroiled in some nasty business with a local gangland thug and threatens to destabilise Eric's whole fragile existence. But what doesn't kill you makes you stronger and that is certainly proved here.

It's a gem. A true Brit movie classic with a wee bit of the Auld Alliance thrown in.

J'adore Eric Cantona!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16682,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2009-05-27","keywords":"manchester,hoarding,mail hoarding,trust,social alienation","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Looking for Eric: U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3450275609","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYzNzI2NTUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU0Nzg4MjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYzNzI2NTUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU0Nzg4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Eric, a football fanatic postman whose life is descending in to crisis, receives some life coaching from Eric Cantona, the famously philosophical footballer.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263740/","name":"Steve Evets","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0134642/","name":"Eric Cantona","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2288625/","name":"Stephanie Bishop"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516360/","name":"Ken Loach"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239471/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104621/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049689/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491956/","name":"Paul Laverty"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The November Man
November Man
programme.desc:
The November Man: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Pierce Brosnan, Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko, Bill Smitrovich. An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2402157/","name":"The November Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkzMDk5NjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMwOTMyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2402157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"abouhelier-r"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"The November Man","reviewBody":"An ex-CIA operative is brought in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect. 

The November Man is directed by Roger Donaldson and stars Pierce Brosnan as its title character. Roger Donaldson also directed The Bank Job (2008) which is one of Jason Statham' best movie. Let me tell you how excited I was when I heard that Pierce Brosnan was returning as a spy; A little bit nostalgic. This film is full of classic spy cliché such as, for instance, people walking away slow motion explosions and it doesn't seem to get started until half way through. However towards the third act the movie really showed itself and I was like: "Why didn't they do that from the beginning?" Unfortunately, the fact is that it's so terribly cliché since the beginning that when you see where things are going and certain puzzle pieces start to make sense, you are already checked out of the movie. Yet, Pierce Brosnan is great; he could play this role eyes closed. Olga Kurylenko is good as well, you grow some sympathy for her character and the movie takes on a completely different meaning when you realised certain things about her. Plus, I have to point out that women are over objectify and her character is only introduced when it's convenient for the man to have a bargaining girl which isn't as cool as it sounds. Brosnan's protegee starring Luke Bracey is pretty cool as well and I think this guy's got a future. This movie reminds me of two other movies released this years: 3 Days to Kill and Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit. 

Overall I think The November Man could have been a lot better thanks to a stronger writing and directing; it's good to see Pierce Brosnan back into the spy game.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65687,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-08-27","keywords":"stripper,premarital sex,sex standing up,sex scene,belgrade serbia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3721243673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3478396/","name":"Luke Bracey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1385871/","name":"Olga Kurylenko"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088199/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500612/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3360218/","name":"Michael Finch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244980/","name":"Karl Gajdusek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1952653/","name":"Bill Granger"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Struck by Lightning
Pogođen gromom
programme.desc:
Struck by Lightning: Directed by Brian Dannelly. With Rebel Wilson, Chris Colfer, Allison Janney, Scott Bailey. A high schooler recounts the way he blackmailed his fellow classmates into contributing to his literary magazine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1791614/","name":"Struck by Lightning","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEyMDk3MzA2MTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDIxODc3Nzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A high schooler recounts the way he blackmailed his fellow classmates into contributing to his literary magazine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1791614/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hsmboy72"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Colfer definitely outdid himself","reviewBody":"Struck By Lightning was perfect on all levels, I can't believe how much I related to Carson; he is definitely one of my new favourite fictional characters ever. As an aspiring author myself, this film was so inspiring for me in terms of writing, it's really made me want to get out there and achieve my goals and not end up in a terrible life that I don't like. This film, although with the unrealistic storyline, was still so realistic on so many levels and I think this will remain a lifelong favourite of mine. Chris is so talented on so many levels.

I cannot wait for this to be released on DVD in this country so I can keep it forever.

As a big fan of his television show, Glee, I immediately fell in love with Chris and his character there. I also, as well as Kurt Hummel, identify myself with Carson so much. I am so glad that I saw this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14719,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-01-11","keywords":"narration from the grave,chin up,blackmail,high school,reference to betty ford","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3931743257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1ODI4NjI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTk4NTYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjM1ODI4NjI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTk4NTYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being struck and killed by lightning, a young man recounts the way he blackmailed his fellow classmates into contributing to his literary magazine."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3182094/","name":"Chris Colfer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2313103/","name":"Rebel Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0376716/","name":"Christina Hendricks"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0200380/","name":"Brian Dannelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011800/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0346585/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0343782/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3182094/","name":"Chris Colfer"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rush
Rush
programme.desc:
Rush: Directed by Ron Howard. With Chris Hemsworth, Daniel Brühl, Olivia Wilde, Alexandra Maria Lara. The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1979320/","name":"Rush","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWEwODJmZDItYTNmZC00OGM4LThlNDktOTQzZjIzMGQxODA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1979320/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bm2759"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"F1 finally has an amazing film","reviewBody":"This is an amazing film. I can't recommend it highly enough for F1 fans like me, sports fans, or anyone interested in a story of rivalry i.e. something different to the unoriginal junk movies which get churned out each year.

All the crew involved should pat themselves on the back. They've done a fabulous job making this film critique, explore and honour two memorable F1 drivers.

James Hunt's fun, party lifestyle along with his brash and raw driving talent. This is contrasted against Niki Lauda's methodical thinking, technical brilliance and professional lifestyle. These two characters are total opposites but as their lives are explored it also acknowledges the value of an enemy, i.e. something to beat. I believe this is a commentary on human nature in that the best of us shines when we have something to beat or overcome.

Do yourself a favour and see it now.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":452017,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-09-13","keywords":"formula 1,rivalry,1970s,racecar driver,playboy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1998301465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzA0MzkyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQxNjAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzA0MzkyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQxNjAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"From Ron Howard comes an exhilarating true story of two legendary rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda, starring Chris Hemsworth."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0117709/","name":"Daniel Brühl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1165110/","name":"Chris Hemsworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312575/","name":"Olivia Wilde"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0234935/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285648/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604948/","name":"Peter Morgan"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

Khumba: Directed by Anthony Silverston. With Jake T. Austin, Adrian Rhodes, Sam Riegel, Bryce Papenbrook. But I found it to be a first-class effort of its type. Oh, yes, it does slow down a bit in the middle; they could have tightened it up quite a lot. 

But some of the animated characters were quite clever, humorous, or both. And the cultural memes and stories utilized in the plot, being out of South Africa, were significantly different than the approach that say, Disney or Dreamworks might have taken.

Your kids will enjoy it.
